attributes.action: Annually hold a binding referendum based on the Top Petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each year a referendum should be put to the UK electorate based on the petition on this site that has collected the most signitures over the year.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
